name: Hong Kong Traditional
description: The traditional scoring system for Hong Kong Mahjong, based on information from wikipedia.

rules.name: Self Flower
rules.notes: If you are the first to play, your flower number is 1. Each subsequent player's flower number is 1 higher than the previous player.

rules.name: Flower Set
rules.description: A full set of flowers of the same color

rules.name: Seven Flowers
rules.notes: In some variations, this counts as an automatic win.

rules.name: All Flowers
rules.notes: In some variations, this counts as an automatic win.
